verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came בִּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> bish-Tei both עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, year בִּשְׁנֵי־ <WH8147> bish-nei- both עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> 'a-Sar ten חֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> Cho-desh in the twelfth month בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> be-'e-Chad in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- [that] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man שָׂ֤א <WH5375> sa take up קִינָה֙ <WH7015> ki-Nah a lamentation עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> par-'Oh for Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to כְּפִ֥יר <WH3715> ke-Fir a young lion גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> go-Yim of the nations נִדְמֵ֑יתָ <WH1819> nid-Mei-ta; unto him Thou art like וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> ve-'at-Tah you כַּתַּנִּ֣ים <WH8577> kat-tan-Nim the monster בַּיַּמִּ֔ים <WH3220> bai-yam-Mim, in the seas וַתָּ֣גַח <WH1518> vat-Ta-gach and thou camest forth בְּנַהֲרוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH5104> be-na-ha-ro-Tei-cha, with thy rivers וַתִּדְלַח־ <WH1804> vat-tid-lach- and troubledst מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> ma-yim the waters בְּרַגְלֶ֔יךָ <WH7272> be-rag-Lei-cha, with thy feet וַתִּרְפֹּ֖ס <WH7515> vat-tir-Pos and fouledst נַהֲרוֹתָֽם׃ <WH5104> na-ha-ro-Tam. their rivers

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, GOD וּפָרַשְׂתִּ֤י <WH6566> u-fa-ras-Ti I will therefore spread out עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha over אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH7568> rish-Ti, my net בִּקְהַ֖ל <WH6951> bik-Hal over thee with a company עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim people רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> rab-Bim; of many וְהֶעֱל֖וּךָ <WH5927> ve-he-'e-Lu-cha and they shall bring thee up בְּחֶרְמִֽי׃ <WH2764> be-cher-Mi. in my net

וּנְטַשְׁתִּ֣יךָ <WH5203> u-ne-tash-Ti-cha Then will I leave בָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> va-'A-retz, thee upon the land עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei upon the open הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh field אֲטִילֶ֑ךָ <WH2904> 'a-ti-Le-cha; I will cast thee forth וְהִשְׁכַּנְתִּ֤י <WH7931> ve-hish-kan-Ti to remain עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all ע֣וֹף <WH5775> of and will cause all the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of the heaven וְהִשְׂבַּעְתִּ֥י <WH7646> ve-his-ba'-Ti upon thee and I will fill מִמְּךָ֖ <WH4480> mi-me-Cha at חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> chai-Yat the beasts כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the whole earth

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will lay אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּשָׂרְךָ֖ <WH1320> be-sa-re-Cha thy flesh עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim; upon the mountains וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י <WH4390> u-mil-le-Ti and fill הַגֵּאָי֖וֹת <WH1516> hag-ge-'a-Yot the valleys רָמוּתֶֽךָ׃ <WH7419> ra-mu-Te-cha. with thy height

וְהִשְׁקֵיתִ֨י <WH8248> ve-hish-kei-Ti I will also water אֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land צָפָתְךָ֛ <WH6824> tza-fa-te-Cha wherein thou swimmest מִדָּמְךָ֖ <WH1818> mid-da-me-Cha with thy blood אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- far הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> he-ha-Rim; [even] to the mountains וַאֲפִקִ֖ים <WH650> va-'a-fi-Kim and the rivers יִמָּלְא֥וּן <WH4390> yim-mal-'Un shall be full מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Me-ka. at

וְכִסֵּיתִ֤י <WH3680> ve-chis-sei-Ti I will cover בְכַבּֽוֹתְךָ֙ <WH3518> ve-chab-bot-Cha And when I shall put thee out שָׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim, the heaven וְהִקְדַּרְתִּ֖י <WH6937> ve-hik-dar-Ti thereof dark אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כֹּֽכְבֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3556> ko-che-vei-Hem; the stars שֶׁ֚מֶשׁ <WH8121> mesh the sun בֶּעָנָ֣ן <WH6051> be-'a-Nan with a cloud אֲכַסֶּ֔נּוּ <WH3680> 'a-chas-Sen-nu, I will cover וְיָרֵ֖חַ <WH3394> ve-ya-Re-ach and the moon לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- will not יָאִ֥יר <WH215> ya-'Ir shall not give אוֹרֽוֹ׃ <WH216> o-Ro. her light

כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All מְא֤וֹרֵי <WH3974> me-'o-rei All the bright אוֹר֙ <WH216> 'Or lights בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven אַקְדִּירֵ֖ם <WH6937> 'ak-di-Rem will I make dark עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha; over וְנָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> ve-na-Tat-ti over thee and set חֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <WH2822> cho-shech darkness עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- over אַרְצְךָ֔ <WH776> 'ar-tze-Cha, upon thy land נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. וְהִ֨כְעַסְתִּ֔י <WH3707> ve-Hich-'as-Ti, I will also vex לֵ֖ב <WH3820> lev the hearts עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim people רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> rab-Bim; of many בַּהֲבִיאִ֤י <WH935> ba-ha-vi-'I when I shall bring שִׁבְרְךָ֙ <WH7667> shiv-re-Cha thy destruction בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim, among the nations עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- into אֲרָצ֖וֹת <WH776> a-ra-Tzot into the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- have not יְדַעְתָּֽם׃ <WH3045> ye-da'-Tam. which thou hast not known

וַהֲשִׁמּוֹתִ֨י <WH8074> va-ha-shim-mo-Ti amazed עָלֶ֜יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha and עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim people רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> rab-Bim, Yea I will make many וּמַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <WH4428> u-mal-chei-Hem at thee and their kings יִשְׂעֲר֤וּ <WH8175> yis-'a-Ru afraid עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha and שַׂ֔עַר <WH8178> Sa-'ar, shall be horribly בְּעוֹפְפִ֥י <WH5774> be-'of-Fi for thee when I shall brandish חַרְבִּ֖י <WH2719> char-Bi my sword עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- before פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> pe-nei-Hem; before them וְחָרְד֤וּ <WH2729> ve-cha-re-Du and they shall tremble לִרְגָעִים֙ <WH7281> lir-ga-'Im at [every] moment אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לְנַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> le-naf-Sho, for his own life בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day מַפַּלְתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH4658> map-pal-Te-cha. of thy fall ס sa-Mek

וְהַֽאֲבַדְתִּי֙ <WH6> ve-ha-'a-vad-Ti I will destroy אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all בְּהֶמְתָּ֔הּ <WH929> be-hem-Tah, also all the beasts מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> me-'Al thereof from מַ֣יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> rab-Bim; beside the great וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> ve-Lo will not תִדְלָחֵ֤ם <WH1804> tid-la-Chem trouble רֶֽגֶל־ <WH7272> re-gel- neither shall the foot אָדָם֙ <WH120> 'a-Dam of man ע֔וֹד <WH5750> od, anymore וּפַרְס֥וֹת <WH6541> u-far-Sot them any more nor the hoofs בְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> be-he-Mah of beasts לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo will not תִדְלָחֵֽם׃ <WH1804> tid-la-Chem. trouble

אָ֚ז <WH227> 'az Then אַשְׁקִ֣יעַ <WH8257> 'ash-Ki-a' deep מֵֽימֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4325> mei-mei-Hem, Then will I make their waters וְנַהֲרוֹתָ֖ם <WH5104> ve-na-ha-ro-Tam and cause their rivers כַּשֶּׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> kash-She-men like oil אוֹלִ֑יךְ <WH1980> o-Lich; to run נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh.
